content: ribbed leggings materials 3 -50g balls sport weight yarn double-pointed set or 40 circular needles for magic loop method size 2 and 3 with smaller needles cast on 80 sts join to work in the round work in k1 p1 ribbing for 1 switch to larger needles and k2 p2 rib for desired length 17 shown switch back to smaller needles and k1 p1 ribbing for 1 cast off in k1 p1 rib weave in ends to finish abbreviations k = knit p = purl sts = stitches
